TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataBoundItemControl implements class System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl

Docs.summary: Exposes the properties that are used to display a single item in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This interface provides properties that are used to display a single item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> data-bound controls.

Docs.summary: Gets the object that represents the data-key value of the row in a data-bound control.
Docs.value: The object that represents the data-key value of the row in the data-bound control.
Docs.returns: The object that represents the data-key value of the row in the data-bound control.

Docs.summary: Gets the current mode of a data-bound control.
Docs.value: The current mode of the data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The possible modes are `ReadOnly`, `Edit` and `Insert`.

Docs.returns: The current mode of the data-bound control.
